title: #102 - A Lot Happened While We Were Gone...
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast the gang covers all the happenings and goings-on of the past month while we were on break! We talk about the Kevin Hart Oscar controversy, R. Kelly and Fyre Festival documentaries, Kevin Spacey's bizarre YouTube video, Gillette's toxic masculinity ad, and Sandra Bullocks love of Korean baby foreskin!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
